name: Foreign Fruit
desc: Instantly heal for 50% of your maximum health .
notes:
The Foreign Fruit is a returning equipment in Risk of Rain 2. 
Activating the Foreign Fruit immediately heals the holder for 50% of their maximum health.


== Tips ==
Combining the Foreign Fruit with a  Rejuvenation Rack allows the player to instantly recover all their health.
The same can be done with a  Corpsebloom, but it will take 10 seconds to finish healing.
Avoid this equipment if using the  Transcendence, as the heal will not benefit shields in any way.
With enough stacks of  Gesture of the Drowned and/or  Fuel Cells, the player can rapidly and continuously heal.
This equipment already pairs well with the  Aegis and  N'kuhana's Opinion, but becomes even more effective when using this strategy.


== Lore ==
“The Nutapple is an exotic fruit picked from the curious Xelphum Tree, native to coastal Gemines on Titan. Renowned for its sweet, yet cleansing flavor (and low caloric total), the Nutapple is a must-have for health enthusiasts everywhere.”

- Dietary Sciences Digest

== Trivia ==
The Foreign Fruit is also known as the "nutapple." According to its logbook entry in the first Risk of Rain, it has the taste of both a cashew and an apple.
